name: Ablung The Maker
effect:
Mercenary • Warlord • Seige
Ablung is a cleric, a fighter, a rogue, and a wizard.
Order: Once per turn: Permanently gain one of the following: +4 ATK, +4 AC, +6 Skill, +1 HP, +1 level, or any feat with a +1 bonus.

name: Adinia Genecourt
effect:
Deverenian • Medicine +5 • Genecourt
React: Once per turn, before an action would remove a Deverenian from your discard pile or deck: Cancel the action.
"Inquisitor, dost thou truly wish to demean my honor by suggesting I would harbor traitors to the throne?"

name: Aida
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Characters adjacent to Aida gain +2 Skill. While Aida is in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms characters gain +3 Skill.
"Creigh is an unholy fiend, and Mnettaor's little better, but both go if we get Ygraine. She's the one we don't see, so she's the one in charge."

name: Albrecht
effect:
Free Kingdoms Warlord • Astral
Magic Resistance +4• Celestial
Albrecht is a cleric, a fighter, and a rogue.
Order: Remove a character in your discard pile from the game: Until the end of the turn, give a Free Kingdoms character an extra melee strike per attack at +4 ATK. This can only target a character once per turn.

name: Ancient Trap
effect:
Trap
React: After this or an adjacent character is targeted with an action (not a melee strike), discard this Trap: The character performing the action must make a Dexterity save (DC 14). If unsuccessful, inflict two wounds on the acting character.

name: Ariella
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Astral • Celestial
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.
"How great Albrecht's love must be, that he risks himself anew for these men."

name: Arkon
effect:
Nothrog • Warlord
Arkon is a fighter and a rogue.
React: Once per turn, after one of your characters kills an opposing character: Remove the opposing character from the game. Ready a NoThRoG of lower level than the opposing character.

name: Armor of Faith
effect:
Armor
While Armor of Faith is in your discard pile, your Cantors have the text: "Spend Order: equip Armor of Faith from your discard pile."
Order: Spend Armor of Faith: Target a character within one rank. The target receives +3 ATK or +3 AC.

name: Armor of the Earth
effect:
Armor • Unique • 5 Charges
Spend Order: Remove one or more Charge tokens: Move a cleric action with a level equal to the number of tokens removed from your discard pile to the top of your deck.

name: Athanaen Threats
effect:
React: After an opposing character performs an action to reduce, redirect, or remove wounds: Cancel the action.
"Athanaes cannot allow the Denskan atrocities to continue. Tell the Cardinal to leave, or we will force him to." - Dexton Feldark

name: Avatar of Magic
effect:
Mercenary • Avatar • Unique • Scribe +5
This card is also a level 1 wizard spell.
React: Once per turn, after you play a spell, perform a Scribe check (DC 20). If successful, attach the spell to this character, as if it were scribed. This ability may not be used on scribed spells.

name: Barbaric Rage
effect:
React: Before performing a melee strike, lose -5 AC and gain +5 ATK until the end of the turn. If this fighter is a Barbarian, he inflicts an additional wound when he hits with a melee strike this turn.
"Sometimes, it's hard to tell the Sarakians from the NoThRoG." - Sceth Hellbringer

name: Be Still
effect:
Mentalist and Wizard only. This is a spell.
Spend React: After a character spends an equipped item or removes a Charge token from an item: That character must succeed with a magic save (DC 15, DC 20 if caster is a Mentalist) or suffer 1 wound and discard the item.

name: Bear's Soul
effect:
Order: Perform a melee strike. You may shuffle Bear's Soul into your deck.
"Uthanak no longer sleeps. He doesn't need to, so long as he has people to kill." - Phython

name: Behind Enemy Lines
effect:
May be played in an opposing formation. This is a Stealth action.
React: Before performing an attack: The attack is a Stealth action.
"We found something in Myreth, Lord Gahid. Something impossible." - Amara the Twined

name: Bela d'Ilchant
effect:
Nothrog • Exile
Bela is a fighter and a rogue. Bela enters play as if he were level 4. Characters targeted by Bela's melee strikes may not play Reacts to the strike.
"He once served Duchess Brymin and Deverenia, but now the guild knows him as the man who betrayed both to Uthanak. Where else could he hope to find proof of his loyalty?" - Kenia

name: Bis
effect:
Elf • Priest of Blood
React: After Bis enters play: Target a level 1 or 2 non-Warlord character in play. Put the target in his owner's hand.
"So the Deverenians have found Dythanus' city? No bother, then. Let us see how Anandale reacts to a reunion with Lekar Osud."

name: Black Dawn
effect:
4 Charges
Spend Order: Attach this card to another character. While it is attached, the character has the text, "React: Once per turn, before this character suffers wounds, remove 1 Charge token from Black Dawn: Reduce the wounds by one."

name: Blackiron Ring
effect:
Deverenians have +2 levels to equip this item.
React: Before this character plays an action card, spend Blackiron Ring: This character has +1 level for playing that card.
"We lost Phrygai. The dwarves lost New Goldenaxe. The city is in play once more." - Lady Gracia Ghenis

name: Blacksand Cannon
effect:
Nothrog • Seige • 2 Charges
May not attack or equip items.
Spend Order: Put two Charge tokens on Blacksand Cannon.
Spend Order: Remove a Charge token: Perform a +7 ranged strike that inflicts an additional wound.

name: Bokos
effect:
Nothrog • Barbarian • Taoth's Legion
Once per turn, Bokos may play a fighter action card from your discard pile as if from your hand. Remove the card from the game.
"You know better than this, Norn. You know who the true enemy is."

name: Bone Armor
effect:
Armor
Elves may equip this item regardless of class. When Bone Armor comes into play, remove up to 3 characters in any discard pile from the game. Bone Armor permanently gains +1 AC for each card removed this way.

name: Bone Fiend
effect:
Elf • Undead
At the end of each turn, kill one of your Elves or remove an Elf in your discard pile from the game.
Order: Kill one of your Undead: Gain +3 ATK until the end of the turn.
"More." - Rustiq Umbala

name: Borrow's Mirror
effect: Spend Order: Retrieve an item this character can equip from any discard pile and equip it to him. If Borrow's Mirror or the targeted item are removed from this character, remove the item from the game.

name: Brin Yscar
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Bard
Order: Once per turn, target character within one rank must make a Will save (DC 13) or he may not perform melee strikes this turn.
"I don't believe in myths, either, milady Windson, but I believe in me."

name: Burning Arrow
effect:
Arrow
Wounds from this character's non-spell ranged strikes may not be reduced.
React: After this character kills an opposing character with a ranged strie, spend the Arrow: Remove the character from the game.

name: Calix's Heart
effect:
Unique
Spend Order: Once per game (twice for Necromancers), target a character in any discard pile. Make a Magic check (DC 4 times target's level). If successful, that character enters play as if your own and becomes Undead. If Calix's Heart leaves play, the target character is killed.

name: Captain Karkos Tzin
effect:
Deverenian Warlord • Mentalist
Imperial Guard
Karkos is a fighter and a wizard.
React: After Karkos is targeted by an action or strike, remove a Deverenian in your discard pile from the game: Redirect the strike or action to an adjacent Deverenian.

name: Certain Doom
effect:
React: After an opponent readies a character outside of the ready phase: Stun the character.
React: After a stunned character moves forward or performs a melee strike: Wound the character.
"Throw me the ido-" - Jonah the Burglar

name: Chaff
effect:
Deverenian
React: After Chaff is killed: Target a Deverenian in your discard pile and shuffle him into your deck.

name: Cheap Sword
effect:
Weapon
React: Before this character dies: return Cheap Sword to your hand.
"Gone through more hands than Baraxton has, but that means a quality lineage." - Jaega Reach

name: Chosen
effect: Order: Target a character in your army. Until the end of the turn, he has +4 ATK and inflicts an additional wound during melee and ranged strikes targeting characters of the opposite alignment.

name: Cloak of Faces
effect:
Armor
3 Charges (6 if equipped by an Illusionist)
May not gain Charge tokens. All opposing characters have -2 Skill.
React: After this character is targeted by a melee or ranged strike, remove a Charge token: Cancel the strike.

name: Collar of Damnation
effect:
React: After killing an opposing character: Remove the character and one card in any discard pile from the game.
"Command loyalty, any way you can." - Vakeros

name: Corinne Drac
effect:
Deverenian
Corinne has +1 level while in play.
React: After Corinne enters play: Perform an Order.
"Uncle is busy, my lords. I trust you would not interrupt."

name: Corsis
effect:
Elf • Unique • Netheryn • Kabal
React: Once per turn, after Corsis plays a spell: Return the spell to your hand.

name: Corten Lye
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Paladin
Characters adjacent to Corten gain +2 AC. While Corten is in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms characters gain +1 AC.
"I don't like going against orders, but Lorden's right. The Denscans won't wait for Terak, but if we don't help them, they won't live to regret it."

name: Costly Lessons
effect:
React: Before making a melee strike roll, remove a character in your discard pile from the game: Gain an ATK bonus for this strike equal to twice the removed character's ATK.
"The Rowan have forgotten the color of their blood. Remind them." - Rathe

name: Curtain's Fall
effect:
Trap
React: After a character in this rank is targeted with a melee or ranged strike, discard this Trap: The character performing the strike must make a Dexterity save (DC 20). If unsuccessful, inflict three wounds on the character.

name: D'Ilchant Keeper
effect:
Deverenian • Paladin • Defend +9
React: Once per turn, after an adjacent character is targeted by a melee strike: Perform a Defend check (DC 20) to cancel the strike.
"Mortal flesh no longer commandeth the Black Sun, Cardinal Creigh. Thou canst not refuse my support in Denska." - Ghed Mnettaor

name: Darast
effect:
Nothrog • Uthanak's Legion
Order: Discard a NoThRoG from your hand: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to twice the level of the discarded character.
"Why are the Deverenians here?! We did everything according to plan… didn't we?"

name: Darkwood Arrows
effect:
Arrow
Rogue and wizard only.
Undead have +2 levels to equip this item.
React: After this character kills a character with a ranged strike, spend the Arrows: Put the killed character face down in your first rank as a level 1 Undead Skeleton with +3 ATK, 10 AC, +0 Skill and 1 HP.

name: Darkwood Cudgel
effect:
Weapon
Order: Spend the Cudgel: Perform a melee strike, which may only target a character of the opposite alignment.
Order: Once per turn, remove an item in your discard pile from the game: Ready the Cudgel.

name: Darkwood Pit
effect:
Weapon
Order: Spend Darkwood Pit: Perform a melee strike. If the strike is successful it inflicts no wounds, but spends the target.
Order: Once per turn, remove an item in your discard pile from the game: Ready Darkwood Pit.

name: Darkwood Spear
effect:
Weapon
React: Before targeting a melee strike from the second rank, spend the Spear: The strike may target a character in an opposing first rank.
React: Once per turn, before a melee strike, remove an item in your discard pile from the game: Ready the Spear.

name: Darkwood Staff
effect:
Weapon
Order: Spend the Staff: Shuffle a wizard spell from your discard pile into your deck.
Order: Once per turn, remove an item in your discard pile from the game: Ready the Staff.

name: Defiance
effect:
Dwarf • Exile
Defiance has -1 HP while spent.
"I'll work with you, Imaran, but not for you."

name: Demand
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian • Powerattack +3
Exile
Demand gains Powerattack +5 (+8 total) while performing melee strikes against higher level characters.
"Get me out of here, and I'll keep your people in line, bard."

name: Destiny
effect:
Dwarf • Seer
Order: Once per turn, remove a Dwarf in your discard pile from the game. Permanently give a Dwarf in your army a bonus to his feats equal to the discarded Dwarf's level.
"No escape, so why bother?"

name: Dreiga
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Characters adjacent to Dreiga gain +3 ATK. While Dreiga is in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms characters gain +1 ATK.
"It's been two hours since we fought the Deverenians, paladin. How long's it been for you?"

name: Durga
effect:
Nothrog
Order: Once per turn, remove a character in another player's discard pile from the game: Perform a melee strike.
"Fight the elves long enough, and you learn to make sure everything's dead."

name: Edge Fiend
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Abyssal • Astral
Characters with the Astral or Ethereal trait lose the trait and gain +10 AC while adjacent to one or more Edge Fiends.
"Outside the Abyss, the abyssals are too real to fully exist. We may only truly slay them in their home. This is key." - Valhala Abyssbane

name: Envy's Snare
effect:
Trap
React: After a character in this rank is targeted with a melee strike, discard this Trap: The character performing the strike must make a Dexterity save (DC 19). If unsuccessful, discard two of the character's items then wound him.

name: Eva Glyn
effect:
Elf • Unique • Marksmanship +4
Eva is a wizard and a rogue. Eva enters play as if she were a level 5 character. Your other Elves have Marksmanship +3. Eva may use Marksmanship on spells.
Order: Once per turn: Perform a +3 ranged strike.

name: Fair Warning
effect:
Spend Order: This fighter gains Riposte +5, Defend +5, and +2 AC. The fighter may use the Riposte and Defend feats any number of times this turn.
"Mourn is the most dangerous place I know of, but dying is the least of its threats." - Lady Tornhawk

name: Falling Stones
effect:
Trap
React: After this character is targeted with a melee strike, discard this Trap: The character performing the strike must make a Dexterity save (DC 18). If unsuccessful, inflict two wounds on the character. Otherwise, inflict two wounds on this character.

name: False Hope
effect:
React: After an opponent's action retrieves one or more cards from his discard pile: Remove those cards from the game.
"Is there any other kind?" - Rustiq Umbala

name: Feldspar Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
You must have a cleric in your army to bring Feldspar Gargoyle into play.
React: After a Dwarf in your army dies, causing an illegal rank: Before fixing ranks, move Feldspar Gargoyle into the rank in front of the illegal rank.

name: Feyd Rowan
effect:
Elf Warlord • Ethereal • Undead
Necromancer
Feyd is a cleric, a rogue, and a wizard.
Order: Once per turn, remove an Elf in your discard pile from the game: Perform a ranged strike equal to the removed Elf's level.

name: Fire At Will
effect:
React: After you roll initiative: Target a character within two ranks. Until the end of the turn, all non-spell ranged strikes targeting that character gain a bonus to this rogue's level (the rogue's level +2 if he is a Scout).
"As you wish, High King." - Mithglyn

name: Flamestone Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Gargoyle
You must have a cleric in your army to start with Flamestone Gargoyle or bring one into play.
React: After Flamestone Gargoyle is killed: Attach it to another Dwarf in your army as a level 5 Armor item with +3 AC.

name: Frozen March
effect: Spend Order: Target up to 3 characters within two ranks. Each target must make a Magic save (DC caster's Skill +7). Stun ready characters who fail. Wound and stun spent characters who fail. Inflict two wounds on stunned characters who fail.

name: Frozen Tomb
effect:
Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks. Until the end of the turn, the character gains +5 AC and may not perform actions. The next two wounds inflicted on the character this turn are negated.
"A beast lairs in Mourn's heart, but its flesh is steel, and its heart molten iron." - The Loremaster

name: Gilbert Basc
effect:
Mercenary
Spend Order: Remove a character in your discard pile from the game: Permanently give a non-Monster character the Monster trait, +1 ATK, and +1 AC.

name: Glyn Quiver
effect:
This character has +1 level for equipping Bows and Arrows, and may equip two Arrows. If Glyn Quiver leaves this character, discard all Arrows this character has equipped.
Order: Spend the Quiver: Ready all Arrows this character has equipped.

name: Grief
effect: React: After this rogue hits an opposing character with a melee strike, attach Grief to that character. While attached, that character has -3 ATK, -3 AC, and -3 Skill. If Grief is discarded from play, return it to your hand.

name: Grim
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian • Defend +5
Grim may play fighter actions.
React: After a Dwarf in this rank suffers a wound: That Dwarf gains +3 ATK.
"Learn from it!"

name: Guild Taxes
effect:
May be played in an opposing formation. This is a Stealth action.
Order: Target one or more items on a character within one rank. Perform a Stealth check (DC 8 + total levels of items). If successful, remove the items from the game.
"Paid on time, whether they know it or not." - Dusan Drake

name: Hammer Into Anvil
effect:
Order: Remove all lower-level characters in discard piles from the game.
"'You are only one or the other,' as Ablung used to say. Which are you, Nitesh?" - Forge

name: Healing Rod
effect:
Does not ready during the Ready Phase.
React: After an opposing character removes a card from any discard pile: Ready Healing Rod.
Order: Spend Healing Rod: Remove a wound from another character within one rank.

name: Hellbringer's Engine
effect:
Nothrog • Seige • Unique • 5 Charges
May not equip items.
Spend Order: Remove a Charge token: Target up to three characters within one rank. Perform a melee strike against each target.
Spend Order: Remove a Charge token: Move forward two ranks.

name: Hellbringer's Quill
effect:
Nothrog • Seige • 6 Charges
May not attack or equip items.
Add a Charge token at the start of each turn.
Spend Order: Remove any number of charge tokens from Hellbringer's Quill: Perform a ranged strike with a bonus equal to the number of tokens removed.

name: Heyga
effect:
Nothrog
Heyga gains a bonus to his ATK equal to the number of characters in all opposing first ranks.
"Dwarven defenses account only for Abyssal insurgents, war chief, not for those from above."

name: Hola Haben
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Unique • Paladin
Narawat • Follower of Djarat
Hola is removed from the game if discarded from your hand. While any copies of Hola are in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms characters gain +1 Hit Point.

name: Isadra
effect:
Elf • Calix
React: Once per turn, after another player discards a card during the Order phase: Perform a +4 ranged strike.
"He said he'd die before telling me about the Loremaster, as though that was really a problem."

name: Isharan Staff
effect:
Weapon • Shield • 5 Charges
Magic Resistance +5
React: Before a melee strike targeting this character, remove one Charge token: The opposing character has -3 ATK and -3 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Jaega Reach
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Priest of Fineltour
Order: Remove an item in your discard pile from the game: One of your Free Kingdoms characters gains an ATK and Skill bonus equal to the items' level until the end of the turn.
"…and if any of the gear's faulty, last rites are free."

name: Jessup Myerdeth
effect:
Deverenian • Seer • Myerdeth
React: Once per turn, after an equal or lower-level character reacts to entering play: Cancel the react.
"Someone else hath slain an imperial aide. The emperor doth wait no longer to begin the rites."

name: Jiyacin Fret
effect:
Free Kingdoms
While Jiyacin is in your discard pile, your Warlord has the text, "Order: Remove Jiyacin from the game: Move one of your Free Kingdoms characters forward one rank."
"Sometimes we need more than hope, Darian. Sometimes we need a sacrifice to drive us on." - Jaqueline Windson

name: Joan Drake
effect:
Mercenary
React: Once per turn, after a character within one rank dies: Remove the character from the game.
The automaton stood before her, silent… until she touched it.

name: Jol Kirpatrick
effect:
Free Kingdoms
Jol has an ATK bonus equal to the number of Free Kingdoms characters in your discard pile.
" was a priest once, but no more. My love for the gods rests now with my son, beneath six feet of blood-soaked Andover mud. The war isn't over. It never will be. The dead make sure of that."

name: Josef Krieg
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Scout
While Josef is in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms characters have the text, "Order: Remove Josef from the game: Perform a +4 ranged strike."
Spend Order: Perform a +1 ranged strike.

name: Justinian
effect:
Deverenian • Seer
While in your discard pile, Justinian gains +2 levels.
React: Once per turn after a die is rolled, add or subtract 2 from the die roll.
"Be not surprised. Thou didst right by us, dwarf."

name: Kariel Glyn
effect:
Elf • Glyn
Spend React: After an adjacent character is killed by an opposing character: Perform a +2 ranged strike.
"We expected casualties, of course, but never due to arrowheads of bone."

name: KarTal
effect:
Nothrog • Monk • 2 Charges
May not gain tokens from other cards.
React: After KarTal kills a character with a melee strike: Put a Charge token on him.
Spend Order: Remove all Charge tokens from KarTal: Perform a melee strike for each token removed.

name: Kelemmen
effect:
Elf • Necromancer
Spend Order: Put an Elf from your discard pile into play face down in rank 1 as a level 1 Undead Skeleton with +3 ATK, 10 AC, and 1 HP. When that Skeleton dies, remove it from the game.

name: La Hashan Amulet
effect:
React: After this character is targeted by a strike or action, remove the Astral or Ethereal trait from this character until the end of the turn: Until the end of the turn, this character gains +8 AC and +8 Skill.
"Before traveling the planes, best make your home safe first." - Avinaar

name: Legend
effect:
Dwarf
Legend has +4 ATK for each copy of Legend in your discard pile.
React: After being targeted with a melee or ranged strike, remove from the game a copy of Legend in your discard pile: Legend gains +4 AC until the end of the turn.

name: Lestan Drac
effect:
Deverenian • Defend +4
React: After a melee or ranged strike is redirected to Lestan: Perform a melee strike targeting the acting character.
"No, you mayest not see him, Master Loth. An you still disagree, I assure you that Inquisitor Chyre would be most eager to hear your arguments."

name: Locked Ring
effect:
3 Charges
React: Once per turn, after an action targets another item within one rank, remove a Charge token: Cancel the action.
"A gift, Krun, from Mekk'iah. Beware thieves."

name: Malachite Gargoyle
effect:
Dwarf • Unique • Gargoyle • Defend +4
You must have a level 4 or higher cleric in your army to bring Malachite Gargoyle into play. Wounds suffered by Malachite Gargoyle may not be reduced or removed. Gargoyles adjacent to Malachite Gargoyle may not be targeted with melee strikes.

name: Mana Shield
effect:
Remove Mana Shield from the game after you play it.
Order: Attach a wizard spell from your discard pile to a character in play. While it is attached, the character has +2 AC and Magic Resistance +2. If the character leaves play, put the wizard spell in your hand.

name: Meddling in Nature
effect:
Druids play this without spending.
Spend Order: Put this card into play in your first rank as a level 2 fighter with the Monster trait, +3 ATK, 13 AC, 0 Skill and 1 HP and the text, "React: After this card readies: Permanently gain +1 ATK and +1 AC".

name: Misear Diplomacy
effect:
React: After your opponent retrieves cards from his discard pile: Return Misear Diplomacy to your hand from your discard pile.
Order: Target a character within one rank who must make a Poison save (DC 20) or suffer a wound (two if this rogue is an Assassin).

name: Mjol's Hammer
effect:
React: After a character within one rank readies during the Order phease, spend Mjol's Hammer: Perform a mele strike targeting that character which inflicts an additional wound if it hits.
"After a while, they get meek, like prairie dogs…" - Jack Casey

name: Myerdeth Ring
effect:
React: Before casting a spell, spend Myerdeth Ring: Opponents may not react to the spell.
"Hm. Albrecht. Pack thy things, Bruin. We needs must visit Denska after all."

name: Nemamiah
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Astral • Celestial
May not start in play. Nemamiah is a fighter and a rogue. Nemamiah enters play as if he were level 3.
React: Before rolling a melee strike against a spent character, discard a character card: Gain +6 ATK for the strike and inflict an additional wound.

name: Nightmist
effect:
Mercenary • Dragon • Ethereal • Undead • Unique •May not equip items.
Spend Order: A Warlord within two ranks must make a number of Magic saves (DC 18) equal to the number of cards in his hand. For each failure, the player must discard a card.
Spend Order: Move forward or backward two ranks.

name: Not in Vain
effect: React: After a character is targeted with a melee or ranged strike: Until the end of the turn, the target has a bonus to ATK and AC equal to the number of action cards in your discard pile. This effect lasts until the end of the next turn if the caster is a Cantor.

name: Once Again
effect:
Order: Remove this card from the game: Take a fighter action from your discard pile and put it in your hand.
"Another battle. Another victory. Can't someone come up with a new challenge?" - Uthanak

name: Orruga
effect:
Nothrog • Uthanak's Legion
Order: Once per turn, target a Nothrog in your army. Until the end of the turn, the target gains Powerattack with a bonus equal to the number of characters currently in your discard pile.
"Of course I know what's become of Bear. Do you?"

name: Oubliette Hound
effect:
Deverenian
Spend React: After a Deverenian equips a Steed: Move him forward one rank.
"Our troups must remember the price of failure." - Lord Gahid Rellion

name: Passing the Mantle
effect:
React: After one or more items are discarded from another character in this rank by an action or that character's death: Equip those items to this fighter, ignoring level restrictions.
"We cannot wait for Terak any longer. The aroch ride with Albrecht." - Sir Lorden

name: Patience
effect:
Dwarf • Assassin
React: After an opposing character performs an action to remove or reduce a wound: Perform a melee strike.
"No, never met anybody by that description."

name: Rampage
effect:
Dwarf • Barbarian
Order: Once per turn, remove a Dwarf in your discard pile from the game: Until the end of the turn, Rampage gains +5 ATK and inflicts an additional wound when he hits with a melee strike.

name: Retributive Strike
effect:
Order: Discard an item equipped to this character: Perform a +7 ranged strike.
Spend Order: Attach this card to this character. While it is attached, this character may play it once per turn, as if from your hand.
"I want to be free, Tepheroth. What do you want?" - Raziel

name: Ritual Scars
effect:
Ritual Scars may not be targeted by card effects.
And I thought I'd never see something I'd call barbaric…" - Edge

name: Rugal
effect:
Nothrog • Barbarian • Uthanak's Legion
Rugal has +3 ATK and -1 AC for each Charge token on him.
React: After Rugal kills an opposing character: Put a Charge token on him.
"He's a scout, of a sort. He's cutting a path to the Dwarven king."

name: Sakal
effect:
Nothrog
Spend Order: Put 2 Charge tokens on a Seige character within 1 rank.
"So much bluster for a walking munitions dump. We ever run out of shot, I know what to use for a replacement." - Varin

name: Saliel
effect:
Elf
Spend Order: Target a character within two ranks who must make a Magic save (DC 10 + Charge tokens on Saliel) or suffer a wound.
React: After Saliel kills a character: Put a number of Charge tokens on Saliel equal to the victim's level.

name: Salvation
effect:
Mercenary • Exile
Order: Once per turn: Perform a melee strike. If this strike misses, wound Salvation.
"The dwarves had their chance with me. Now it's Yedraw's turn. Sorry, Nitesh, but not all sins are forgiven."

name: Sarakian Ox
effect:
Steed
Order: Spend Sarakian Ox: Move forward or backward one rank.
React: After this rogue is targeted by a melee strike, spend Sarakian Ox: Redirect the strike to Sarakian Ox, which becomes a level 2 Astral rogue with +6 ATK, 9 AC, +8 Skill, 1 HP, and Riposte +5 for the strike.

name: Saving Grace
effect:
While this card is in your discard pile, you may play it as if it were in your hand and then remove it from the game.
Spend React: Before a character suffers wounds: Reduce the wounds by one.
"We shall spell of this anon, Sir Rhawn… but not today." - Cardinal Bromin

name: Sceyenn
effect:
Mercenary
React: After an opposing character performs an action which causes you to discard one or more cards from your hand: Either cancel the action or discard an equal number of cards from the acting player's hand.

name: Sedayah Rowan
effect:
Mercenary • Druid
React: Once per turn, after an opposing character readies during the Orders Phase: Cancel the action. Ready a character.
"All life is precious. Alias understood that, Rathe. Her father did once, too. If you loved her, how can you not?"

name: Sevanis the Lost
effect:
Deverenian • Illusionist
React: Once per turn, after one of your Deverenians moves forward a rank: He performs an Order.
"A city as large as Luthlarius, but hidden for all its days… until now."

name: Shadow Breath
effect:
Mercenary • Monster • Abyssal
Astral • Illusionist
Order: Once per game, attach a level 1 or 2 wizard spell from your discard pile to Shadow Breath.
React: After Shadow Breath performs a melee strike, spend a spell attached to him: Cast the spell as if he were a wizard.

name: Signon's Scabbard
effect:
React: Spend the Scabbard before an illegal rank is fixed: Target a character in the illegal rank with a lower level than this character. Fall the target forward.
"Victory cometh not to he that warreth best, but to imposeth his own rules upon his enemy's battles." - Signon

name: Sipho Hamisi
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Narawat
Sipho is a rogue and a cleric.
Sipho enters play as if he were level 4. Sipho is removed from the game if discarded from your hand. While at least one Sipho is in your discard pile, your Free Kingdoms characters gain an additional melee strike at +0 ATK.

name: Soul Shield
effect:
Shield • Unique
Order: Once per game, move this item to an adjacent character (ignoring class) and remove a character from your discard pile: The character with Soul Shield equipped has two extra hit points while the shield is equipped.

name: Spell Components
effect:
4 Charges
React: Before this wizard forces a character to make a Magic save, remove any number of Charge tokens: Increase the DC of the save by twice the number of tokens removed.

name: Spirits' Wrath
effect:
Astral and Ethereal only.
React: Before this character is wounded, moved, spent, or stunned as the result of an opposing action (not a melee strike): Inflict the same effect on the character who performed the action.

name: Springing Spear Trap
effect:
Trap
React: After this character is targeted with a melee strike, spend the Trap: The character performing the strike must make a Dexterity save (DC 15). If unsuccessful, wound the character.

name: Staff of Storage
effect:
Weapon • 7 Charges
Order: Remove any number of Charge tokens: Attach a wizard spell to the Staff with a level equal to the tokens removed.
Order: Remove a Charge token and spend the Staff: Cast an attached spell as if it were in your hand.

name: Summon Swarm
effect: Spend Order: Put this card and the top two cards of your deck into play face-down within one rank as level 1 classless Monsters with +3 ATK, 9 AC, 1 HP, and the text, "Spend React: After entering play: Perform a melee strike." If the caster is not a Summoner, discard all three characters at the end of the turn.

name: Supply
effect:
Dwarf
Spend Order: Equip an item in your discard pile to one of your Dwarves. The Dwarf has +2 levels for this action if an opponent has discarded any of your items this turn.

name: Survivor
effect:
React: After a melee or ranged strike misses this character: All opposing characters who miss this rogue with a melee or ranged strike this turn (including this strike) suffer -5 AC until the end of the turn.
"I remember the Andover long gone. When I am gone, Andover will remember me." - Rathe

name: Sword of the Ancients
effect:
Weapon
Sword of the Ancients has +1 ATK for each item in your discard pile.
React: Before making a melee strike roll, discard an item from your hand: This character inflicts an additional wound if he hits.

name: Taltos the Hale
effect:
Deverenian • Unique • Rellion
Taltos is a fighter and a wizard. Taltos enters play as if he were level 5.
Order: Once per turn: Target a Weapon, Shield, or Steed in your discard pile and equip it to one of your Deverenians.

name: Talyn
effect:
Elf • Kabal
Spend Order: Discard a card from your hand: Perform a number of +0 ranged strikes equal to Talyn's level.
"Anton leaves us for months, and Arak Spire falls in that time. They need a new warder, and the Kabal are best to choose him."

name: Tepheroth's Scepter
effect:
Weapon
Necromancers have +2 levels to equip this item.
React: After this wizard puts a character into play from the discard pile, spend the Scepter: The returned character permanently gains the Undead trait and +1 hit point.

name: Teufeltiger's Mask
effect:
Helm
React: After a character targets this wizard with a melee strike: The character must make a Will save (DC 5 + this wizard's skill) or suffer -5 ATK until the end of the turn.
"One of many, I assure thee." - Lord Kestrel

name: The Broken Earth
effect:
Dwarf Warlord • Gargoyle
Broken Earth is a cleric and a fighter. Your other Gargoyles have the text, "Spend React: Before Broken Earth dies, kill this Gargoyle: Broken Earth does not die. Remove all wounds and items from Broken Earth, ready him and move him to this Gargoyle's former location."

name: The Front Line
effect:
Deverenian
Spend React: After a Deverenian in this rank kills a character with a melee strike: Perform a melee strike.
"Our undead ranks suffer, my queen, but no less than their living." - Sileth Elestra

name: The Maker's Call
effect: React: After a character enters play from the discard pile: Your opponent's next action may not target that character with a melee strike or action. The character gains +3 ATK and +3 Skill until the end of the turn.

name: The Maker's Way
effect:
Dwarves have +2 levels to equip this item.
React: Before this character equips an item, spend the Maker's Way: This character has +1 level for equipping the item.
"You'd be surprised how familiar our crafts are in the World Above." - Forge

name: The Restless
effect:
Mercenary • Undead
While the Restless is in your discard pile, your Warlord has the text, "Order: Discard a card: Put the Restless into your hand from your discard pile."
"The elves once ruled Tseleuse, but no more. The dead won't stay buried." - Kara Wadreth

name: Torvald Tremayne
effect:
Deverenian • Tremayne
Torvald's items are considered blank.
Spend Order: Equip an item from Torvald to one of your characters within one rank.
React: Once per turn, before a Deverenian is killed: Equip an item on that Deverenian to Torvald, ignoring level requirements.

name: Trail
effect:
Dwarf • Ranger •Exile
React: After an opposing character moves forward without spending: Move Trail forward one rank. Until the end of the turn, Trail gains +4 ATK when targeting that character with melee strikes.

name: Transference
effect:
Spend Order: Move up to 3 Charge tokens from a card in play to a card in this rank.
Order: Spend an item.
"Our side. Thier side. Details are so dull, sometimes."-Asta Syneri

name: Treason's Wages
effect:
Spend Order: Until the end of the turn, your characters have +2 ATK and inflict an additional wound with melee strikes while they have a Weapon equipped.
"The Denskans prove deaf to hymns. Mayhap they prefer screams." - Cardinal Creigh

name: Treeshape
effect: Spend Order: This cleric may not perform actions, has +3 HP and -6 AC (-1 AC if the caster is a Druid), and his items are considered blank. The effects of this spell end when the cleric becomes ready. The cleric may remain spent during the ready phase.

name: Treyik
effect:
Elf • Novice of Bone
After Treyik is discarded from your hand, you may put him into play.
Order: Kill one of your Undead: Give an Elf a +3 ATK and +3 AC.
"What did Kelanor find?" - Master Anandale

name: Twist the Blade
effect:
While this card is in your discard pile, you may play it as if it were in your hand and then remove it from the game.
React: Before making an attack: The attack ignores all AC bonuses from any source other than Armor.
"Stay out of this, Sir Rhawn. You were warned once." - De'zicrah

name: Tzin's Legacy
effect:
Mentalist and Seer only. This is a spell.
Spend Order: Attach Tzin's Legacy to this character. While it is attached, opponents must play with their hands revealed. Opposing Warlords gain the text, "Spend Order: Make a Will save (DC 10 + caster's skill) to discard Tzin's Legacy."

name: Uncertain Path
effect:
3 Charges
Spend Order: Attach this card to one of your characters. While attached, the character has the text, "Order: Remove a Charge token from Uncertain Path: Move forward or backward one rank."
"Well done, JaQui. Well done, indeed." - Master K'Hallaek

name: Uriah Blackwood
effect:
Free Kingdoms • Unique
Spend Order: Target this or an adjacent rank. Until the end of the turn, all Free Kingdoms characters in the targeted rank gain an AC bonus equal to the number of characters in your discard pile.

name: Veiled Passing
effect:
React: After an opposing character reacts to an action, strike, or movement performed by one of your characters: Cancel the react.
"We cannot fight the Deverenians directly, but when have we ever?" - Lord Halbrook

name: Vietor
effect:
Elf • Mentalist • Scout • Unique
Spend Order: Discard your hand: Perform a number of consecutive +4 ranged strikes equal to the number of cards discarded
"Netheryn's debates choke the courts, and yet Rellion no longer fights them. Why?" - Tepheroth

name: Viper's Tongue
effect:
Weapon
React: After this character hits with a melee strike, spend Viper's Tongue: The target must make a Poison save (DC 14, 19 if this rogue is an Assassin) or suffer a wound and become stunned.
"Through all this, where is Sav'rukk?" - Kenia

name: Wanderdust
effect: Spend Order: Discard Wanderdust and target an equal or lower-level character within one rank: Move the target character back two ranks (three if this character is a Druid)

name: Waste of Life
effect:
Rogue and wizard only. This is a spell.
React: Before a stunned character performs a check or save: The check or save is a critical failure.
"Keep them intact next time." - Rustiq Umbala

name: Weapon Breaker
effect:
Shield
React: Before a melee strike roll targeting this character, spend Weapon Breaker: Perform a Defend check (DC 16 + level of attacker). If successful, discard an item equipped by the attacker.

name: Weirdling
effect:
Mercenary • Stealth +10Weirdling is Astral if your initiative roll was odd, and Ethereal if it was even.
React: Before Weirdling enters play, spend an Illusionist in your army: Weirdling enters play in an opposing first rank. This is a Stealth action.

name: Whey
effect:
Elf • Mentalist • Nimbic
Whey dies at the end of the turn.
Order: Kill Whey: Target a player who must reveal and discard the top 3 cards of his deck.
"The 'High King' has many uses for us, of course, just few that involve dying old men." - Raziel

name: Wizard Eye
effect:
Mentalist and wizard only. Mentalists have +1 level for casting. This is a spell.
React: After an opposing character equips an item: Return the item to that player's hand. That character may not equip items with that name until the end of the turn.

name: Wyvern's Flames
effect:
Spend Order: Target a character within three ranks. Until the end of the turn, that character gains +7 ATK, and must make a magic save (DC 19) after he performs an action or suffer 1 wound.
"Hate. In that name, I would burn all that is to cinder, and crush the life from the ashes, if only to bury Krun in the waste of the world." - Padrig

name: Wyvern's Scale
effect:
Shield • Magic Resistance +6
React: After this character cancels a spell, spend Wyvern's Scale: Inflict a wound on the caster of the canceled spell.
"No tricks, Sceth. You want to win, win on your own." - Vakeros
